reviewText: This is a Soviet documentary.  Fairly interesting...

After viewing in Amazon Prime, I have to get the DVD, too.
One of the finest films I have ever seen.

Was not the movie we were searching for (we later found "The" Battle for Sevastopol) but this is still a well done docudrama with English voice-over option available as a language selection.  Note that it is in black and white format, and the the graphics are uncensored from the original movie produced when the Red Army removed the last of the German Army from the Soviet lines.
